mapper.select: select owner_id, owner_name from owner where owner_status = 0 and community_id = #{communityId}

select o.owner_id ,owner_name, owner_idcard, owner_birth, owner_phone, owner_profession, owner_sex, owner_type, owner_describe, owner_createtime, home_name,community_name from owner o left join community c on o.community_id = c.community_id left join home h on o.owner_id = h.owner_id
owner_status = 0
and ( owner_name like concat('%',#{searchDto.keyword},'%') or owner_idcard like concat('%',#{searchDto.keyword},'%') or owner_phone like concat('%',#{searchDto.keyword},'%') or owner_profession like concat('%',#{searchDto.keyword},'%') )
and ( owner_birth between #{searchDto.startDate} and #{searchDto.endData} or owner_createtime between #{searchDto.startDate} and #{searchDto.endData} )
limit #{searchDto.page},#{searchDto.size}
mapper.insert: insert into owner(community_id, owner_name, owner_idcard, owner_birth, owner_phone, owner_profession, owner_sex, owner_type, owner_describe, owner_createtime, owner_updatetime) values (#{owner.communityId}, #{owner.ownerName}, #{owner.ownerIdcard}, #{owner.ownerBirth}, #{owner.ownerPhone}, #{owner.ownerProfession}, #{owner.ownerSex}, #{owner.ownerType}, #{owner.ownerDescribe},now(),now())
